contest-event.event-date:
April 29, 2001 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section B)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section B) 20 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-section-b
Civic Hall, Holmfirth Hymn tune contest - 1st Boarshurst, 2nd Slaithwaite. Best trombone - Slaithwaite. Best euphonium - Boarshurst. 75th annual contest.
April 6, 2012, 8:29 a.m. Sept. 15, 2015, 10:57 a.m.
1 Slaithwaite Band Kevin Lever
2 Boarshurst Silver Band Brian Broadbent
3 Uppermill Band Jim Hunter
4 Shaw Youth Band Ted Tooley
